author: rooneg
msg: Fix a crash in the command line client's prompting code.
(svn_cmdline_setup_auth_baton): Correct setup of the prompt providers,
they take a pointer to the prompt baton, not a pointer to a pointer

author: sussman
msg: Fix violations of our policy regarding public/private symbols.
svn_txdelta_apply_instructions):  ... and declare here, as public funcs.
(apply_window):  call public function instead of private one.
(compose_handler):  call public functions instead of private ones.
(rep_undeltify_range): call public function instead of private one.
(get_combined_window):  call public function instead of private one.
(get_contents): call public function instead of private one.
(do_random_combine_test):  call public function instead of private one.
(main): call public function instead of private one.

author: pburba
msg: merge r16324:17095 from svn/trunk to svn/branches/ebcdic/trunk.

author: djames
msg: (create_python_hook_script): Avoid incorrect use of os.path.join. Simplify

msg: to better reflect its purpose. Followup to r17285.
